name: Naughty Nelly
description:
A  jigsaw-style blocking-pushing puzzle-game. Nelly the elephant has been sent to her room but stubbornly refuses to obey. Can you help her?

  • Made for: Thinky Puzzle Game Jam
  • Number of levels: 10
  • Average play time: 60 mins
  • Published: July 2021 
  • Keyboard controls: arrow keys or WASD to move; [Z] to undo; [R] for restart. 
  • Touchscreen controls: tap at the main menu; swipe to move; open the tab menu in the upper left to undo moves and restart.

Hackable version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=5b2e281d93246a70b1c7399f324a27c5
